comments.content:
looks like a cut Avant Garde alternate M

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020193008im_/http:/typophile.com/files/M_4720.png)
Looks sort of like it's missing the in-cuts on the back areas (whatever those are called), too.
I think you're referring to ink traps.
Sergio, is the sample you posted the actual glyph or did you redraw it from memory to show us the shape?
